resources.string: Duress Lock, Duress PIN, Duress Password

Duress mode will wipe the device data encryption keys. Duress mode does not erase the presence of GrapheneOS on the device. After duress mode has been triggered by the user, the device data will become unrecover and device won\'t be usable without a complete wipe from recovery.
Duress feature allows you to quickly wipe your data encryption keys without unlocking your phone, making it impossible to recover the data stored in the device.
